name: WORD CRAWLER
description:
A simple text based RPG I made at the start of my python development journey (Around early 2022).

Do not expect updates to this game as it was my first game made in a scripting language and in my opinion, is best kept at the stage it is in...

By the way, your anti-virus program(if you have one) may try and stop you from opening this program as it was written in Python and converted to a ".exe" file via "auto-py-to-exe".
